questionTitle: Scientists and engineers <u><font color='red'>have invented</font></u> filters and other methods <u><font color='red'>of</font></u> removing pollutants <u><font color='red'>for</font></u> industrial <u><font color='red'>wastes</font></u>.

In order to survive, trees <u><font color='red'>rely to</font></u> the amount <u><font color='red'>of</font></u> annual rainfall they receive, <u><font color='red'>as well as</font></u> the <u><font color='red'>seasonal distribution</font></u> of the rain.

The <u><font color='red'>purchased</font></u> of Louisiana <u><font color='red'>was</font></u> one of the biggest <u><font color='red'>events</font></u> in the <u><font color='red'>history</font></u> of the United States.
In Britain home ownership has ________ rapidly since 1960.
Nobody ________ that aeroplane crash.
The bus was so late reaching the station that I ________ missed my train.
The manager did not offer her the job because of her untidy ________.
You ________ have seen the Jacobs yesterday - they're in Australia .
The hotel has been built on the ________ of a lake.
His performance was ________; the audience was delighted .
Please ________ your bill before you leave the shop and make sure that it is correct.
It's difficult to see through the windscreen - I can't even make ________ where the road is.
I found the book rater dull, I couldn't read it ________.
She has to work hard to keep the house ________ and tidy with three small children.
How much have you borrowed ________ me already?
This warm coat will protect you ________ the cold .
Spies may have a number of ________ names and papers.
He was ________ after he had packed for the holidays.
If I had known about it, I ________ him to go.
You ________ better be careful not to miss the train!
I hope you don't mind me ________ so late at night.
As cunning as a ________ = very clever, very smart.
Archaeology is one of the most interesting scientific ________.
